description:
### Default Manager Configuration

This configuration includes custom settings for various managers. Below are the details:

#### npm

- **File Match**: Matches `package.json` files.

- **Rollback PRs**: Enables rollback pull requests.

- **Versioning**: Uses npm versioning.

For more details, refer to the [Renovate Schema](https://docs.renovatebot.com/renovate-schema.json).
